function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {

return ”;

return input.trim();
}
}

Product Description

Compatible Laptops
10-15.6″
10-17.3″
10-15.6″
10-17.3″

Height Adjustable
✓
✓

✓

✓

Product Weight
appr. 4 lbs (more stable)
appr. 2.2 lbs
appr. 2 lbs
appr. 5 lbs

Key Features
Heavy & Stable
Minialist & Adjustable
Minimalist
Sit to Stand Working

Suit for any laptop 10 to 15.6 inches – The laptop stand fits all laptops 10 to 15.6 inches, such as notebooks PC computers 10 inches, 11 inches, 12 inches, 13 inches, 13.3 inches, 14 inches, 15 inches, 15.4 inches, 15.6 inches, etc.
Sturdy and portable – The office computer stand is totally made of thickened aluminum alloy, so the stand is sturdier and has less wobbly. The rubber on the holder hands sticks tightly and ensure your laptop stable on the stand. And the rubber feet prevent the stand from slipping on your desktop. Moreover, the stand is detachable and easy to install without tools, so the lightweight laptop stand is really portable.
Ergonomic design – The slim compact stand elevates your laptop by 6-inch to a perfect eye level and prevents you from hunching over your screen, which reduces neck and shoulder pain. Moreover, the edge of the stand is so smooth that protects you from being scratched.
Cooling better and keep desktop organized – The ventilated elevator desk stand only has two holder hands but not a whole flat, so there is more space to enable the heat to vent and keep your notebook computer from overheating. Also, you can organize your office items such as keyboard and mouse under the thin stand.
Detachable and simple installation – The laptop stand can be conveniently disassembled into 3 parts. And You can easily reassemble it again easily.


SOUNDANCE

Let’s Enjoy Healthier Work Style!

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

From the brand

SGIN

The Best Choice for PC

SGIN LAPTOP AND KIDS TABLET

SGIN was established in 2007, we are a very professional notebook manufacturer for 14 years. SGIN cooperates with many dealers around the world, We devoted to providing the the highest quality products and best reliable service with customers all over the world.

What makes our products unique?

The key components of SGIN products are all from the world’s top 3 suppliers, especially we also have an industry-experienced R&D and production team.

Why do we love what we do?

We have been selling products on the premise of meeting customer needs, and are committed to providing customers with higher quality and more efficient products.

Valid date after Purchase

Laptop: 1 Year

Tablet: 1 Year

Efficient Performance: Traditional Laptop Pre-installed with the latest Windows 11, equipped with a powerful Intel Celeron N4020C CPU with a turbo boost frequency of up to 2.8 GHz, it provides instant response to efficiently and quickly handle multi-application and multimedia tasks, smoothly transfer 4K content and play your favorite high-quality PC games.
Storage and Memory: With 4GB of built-in RAM and 128GB of SSD storage, the laptop 15 times faster performance than traditional hard drives, allowing you to experience improved multitasking and higher bandwidth. It also supports 512GB TF card expansion
Powerful Battery Life: The compact and lightweight laptop is equipped with an advanced 38,000 MWH rechargeable battery that lasts up to 8 hours.
Multi-functional Connectors: Fast connection to Bluetooth 4.2 and dual-band Wi-Fi fast wireless. Type-C port x1, Mini HDMI x1, 3.5mm headphone jack x1, USB 3.0 port x2, microSD slot x1.
Worry-free after-sales, do more with greater peace of mind thanks to 365 days warranty service, worry-free after-sales. If you have any questions, please contact us, we will reply to you within 12 hours to help you solve the problem.

Price: $29.99 - $17.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 03:52:55 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Water-resistant Compatible with Windows and Mac OS

104 keys US layout keyboard which can prevent damage from spilled drinks or coffee. The designed also keep your keyboard durable and waterproof.”

2-in-1 Keyboard for Gaming or Typing

A keyboard is a must-have tool for anyone who spends many hours typing to do office work every day. So backlit keyboards are designed for the gamer, office worker, copywriter, programmer, typing teacher, and editors.

Lock WIN key to enter game mode

Use FN + WIN keys to turn off the LED keyboard win key to enter the game mode, no longer need to worry about intense game touch win key pop-up start menu bar and lead to screen lag

Friendly Tips

1 Mechanical feel gaming keyboard is not a real mechanical keyboard, but the feel is similar to mechanical keyboard and less noise than mechanical keyboard, suitable for people who need office and game.If you need a real mechanical keyboard, please consider before ordering.

2. The LED of wired backlit keyboard has three colors: red, blue and purple. Press the backlight button to switch between single colors.Due to the differences between versions, if you receive a keyboard without backlit keys, you can use FN+Scroll Look to switch the backlight colour.

We advocate using a simple monochrome keyboard to help you improve your focus in office and gaming. If you need a rainbow breathing keyboard, please consider before ordering.

3.DBpower gaming keyboard product service: 12 months.

4.What’s inside the box? 1*DBpower mechanical feel gaming office 2-in-1 keyboard,1*User’s manual”

【3-Color RGB LED Backlight】Backlit keyboard have 3 Backlight modes providing you immersing gaming experience. Adjustable 23 level brightness meets different needs. You can customize your own backlit keyboard through adjusting the brightness and breathing speed of the backlit. Better enjoy the fun of the game.
【100% Anti-ghosting】Gaming Keyboard made of solid Metal Frame，No fading, more wear-resistant, avoiding the trouble of fading characters.104-key Gaming Keyboard, 19 Non-Conflict Keys, Removable Keycaps, Strengthened Space Key. Specially designed keys for enhanced durability and tactile feedback offers a professional gaming feeling，Give you a greater advantage in the competition.
【12 Function Hotkey Design】Mechanical keyboard features 12 easy-to-reach function keys for multimedia control of video and music, email, and more. Ideal for entertainment, teaching, and office, saving you time and making work and life easier. Convenient and worry-free .This keyboard suitable for families, offices, and travel.
【Ergonomic Design Keyboard 】The design of the pc keyboard accords with ergonomics, is not tired after long-term use, and provides you with the comfort needed for a marathon. The splash-proof feature prevents the internal components of the pc gaming keyboard from being damaged by accidental spills of coffee or water. Effectively prolong the service life, easy to clean.
【Sensitive&Wide Compatibility 】Wired Gaming Keyboard strokes are light and stress-free, and the rebound speed is fast .keyboard combination is very durable and compatible with Windows 2000 / ME / XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10. The Wired Keyboard suitable for desktops, Chrome books, PCs, laptops, computers, smart TVs

Read more

Product Description

Intel CPU & Windows 11

Powerful Intel Celeron processor N, combined with Intel HD Graphics 500, can run your applications with lightning fast response speed and efficient Windows 11 to keep you efficient all day long.

Dual speakers

With two built-in stereo speakers, enjoy high-quality video, music and online entertainment and educational content playback.

HD camera

With 2.0M HD camera and built-in microphone, it can meet the needs of video conferencing, online office, online classroom and many other scenarios.

Full size keyboard,High Precision Touchpad

Enjoy a faster and more accuratetyping experience through optimizedkey stroke and response speed.

Supports a variety of touch gestures, making youroperation more comfortable and smooth.

Long battery life

Equipped with a high quality 34.6Wh battery for up to 6-8 hours of battery life and up to 480 hours of standby time. A full charge can easily meet daily needs.
